name: Survival Volcano Island 3D
description:
Collect resources, craft and survive in new game Survival Volcano Island 3D !!!

You found yourself on a deserted volcano island!
There are you are many wild hungry animals. Your can only mine, get ores and tress. Probably people left these lands long time ago because you see some strange and deserted houses.
You should do your best if you want to survive even on night!
Take a look at Survival Volcano Island 3D!
Look for resources, gather and collect them and craft new items. Build houses, weapons and instruments like axe and pick. Then hunt on animals for food. Beware of predators!

Survival Volcano Island 3D game features:
+ Crafting, survival, hunting and building simulator;
+ Wild animals and wild life;
+ Cool big volcano island adventure;
+ A lot of different acitvies to do;
+ Cute 3D graphics!

Be ready for a one of the perfect survival game - Survival Volcano Island 3D!
Let’s try! Good luck and survive!
